sub_title: International Trade Compliance | High Tech Import & Export | Fairtrade Advocate
summary:
I am an LLM-educated Attorney admitted to practice law in the courts of the Republic of Botswana. Trained and experienced in trade and investments, international business law, economic development, quantitative and qualitative research, with a solid foundation in Common Law legal systems, specialized in international and European business law. 

My professional experience has continuously developed in a range of legal issues within legal insurance, private practice, government agencies, and diplomatic representatives.

Commercially aware, with an in-depth understanding of international trade and business concepts, I am a well-grounded, dynamic, and reliable professional naturally drawn to approaching new knowledge with critical thinking and collaboration, leading to clear set solutions that bring value.

I consistently demonstrate a proactive attitude and welcome tough challenges with composure and diligence.

Key Competencies
- Litigation
- Legal Consultancy
- Contract Management 
- Communication and Negotiation
- Investment and Trade Relations
- Development Policy Analysis
- Business Strategy and Management

Technologies
- Windows and Mac OS, MS Office Suite, LexisNexis, Juta, Zoom, Google Workspace, and basics of Python.

Key Achievements 
- Contributed legal research and opinions in Competition Law based on the National Competition Policy (Botswana), resulting in the Botswana Competition Bill enacted in 2018.
- Represented the Embassy of Botswana (Berlin), engaging with industry experts including Deutsche Bahn, KfW Bankengruppe, and PwC.
- Successful negotiation of 90% of civil matters related to family law, contract enforcement, and unfair labor practices in previous roles.

Please contact me at ta.phometsi@gmail.com to find out how I might contribute and add value to your organization.
